comments:
I've accidentally selected task working set when checking out some project from CVS. After that, the following exception happens when trying to edit that working set.

-- Error Log --
Date: Wed Jun 06 16:03:08 EDT 2007

Created an attachment (id=70448)
fix for the NPE issue

Mik, Rob, please apply this

Closing. The fix for original cause of this issue will be in next 3.3 build/rc.

191342: Checkout operations can add null elements to working set
https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=191342
